environments.prompt: Lively medieval market square with wooden stalls selling wares, colorful banners, horse carts, townsfolk bartering, cobblestone ground, historical trading hub atmosphere.

environments.name: Isolated Forest Cabin
environments.description: Remote woodland cabin at night with eerie surroundings
environments.prompt: Secluded log cabin in dark forest, dim lantern light from windows, surrounding trees casting shadows, misty ground, unsettling isolation, potential for supernatural encounters.

environments.name: Art Deco Ballroom
environments.description: Elegant 1920s dance hall with geometric designs
environments.prompt: Glamorous art deco ballroom with geometric patterns, crystal chandeliers, polished marble floor, mirrored walls, jazz band stage, luxurious roaring twenties elegance.

environments.name: Quantum Physics Lab
environments.description: Advanced facility with experimental equipment
environments.prompt: High-tech quantum lab with particle accelerators, cryogenic chambers, computer arrays, laser beams, sterile white environment, cutting-edge scientific research vibe.

environments.name: Fairy Glade
environments.description: Magical forest clearing with miniature dwellings
environments.prompt: Whimsical fairy glade with glowing flowers, tiny mushroom houses, sparkling dew, butterflies and fireflies, soft pastel lighting, enchanting miniature world.

environments.name: Abandoned Amusement Park
environments.description: Decayed fairground with rusty rides and weeds
environments.prompt: Eerie abandoned amusement park with rusted rollercoasters, overgrown paths, faded clown signs, broken ticket booths, foggy atmosphere, nostalgic yet creepy decay.

environments.name: Rooftop Garden
environments.description: Urban green space with plants and city views
environments.prompt: Lush rooftop garden with raised planters, flowers and herbs, lounge seating, string lights, panoramic city skyline view, refreshing urban oasis escape.

environments.name: Black Sand Beach
environments.description: Volcanic shoreline with dark sand and waves
environments.prompt: Dramatic black sand beach from volcanic ash, crashing ocean waves, rocky cliffs, overcast sky, unique geological formation, powerful natural contrast.

environments.name: Holographic Projection Room
environments.description: Futuristic space with interactive 3D holograms
environments.prompt: Minimalist room with holographic projectors, floating 3D images, touch interfaces, ambient blue lighting, high-tech presentation or entertainment space, immersive digital experience.
